package.name: Tunnel of Light
package.shortDescription: This is Tunnel of Light wallpaper for both HS and LS!

descriptionlist.description: This is a Status Bar for XenHTML with all the details you need to know!
It's available for both HS and LS!
Make sure to move around a bit to fit to screen.

screenshot.description: This is how it'll look like.
This is how it'll look like on LS
This is how it'll look like on HS.
